n insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to find."

 I think niether Moon, nor the C2C staff want facts to interfere with the d=
iscussions! I think he can stick his "Scole" meetings, and any other scams =
up his -----, and may he get the spirit contacts he deserves!
